title: Scenery
content:
Scenery refers to static objects in the world that can be interacted with. Some of these are skill nodes, which are used by professions to gather items.

Each scenery object has one or more actions that the players can use to interact with the object, with an "Info" action always appearing last. The "Info" action opens an interface displaying the scenery object's name, image, description, and location graphics.
